How can I get a block template using the Verus command line interface?
To get a block template using the Verus command line interface, you can use the `getblocktemplate` command. Simply type `verus getblocktemplate` and press Enter.

Examples: > verus getblocktemplate > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getblocktemplate", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
